exec: // Tests for adding a product to favorites
// 1) Customer can add product to favorites with product_id
// 3) Returns 400 error if product already in favorites
catch (e) { pm.expect.fail("Response body is not valid JSON"); }
// 1) Validate request includes product_id (in body or URL)
try { const j = JSON.parse(reqBodyRaw || "{}"); return j.product_id != null; } catch (_) { return false; }
pm.expect(hasBodyProductId || hasUrlParam, "product_id should be supplied in body or URL").to.be.true;
pm.expect(text, "success message should mention added/favorited").to.satisfy(s => s.includes("added") || s.includes("favorit"));
pm.expect(text, "error should indicate already exists/in favorites").to.satisfy(s => s.includes("already") || s.includes("exists") || s.includes("duplicate"));
